text: Guzeripl () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Dakhovskoye Rural Settlement of Maykopsky District, Russia. The population was 103 as of 2018. There are 5 streets. == Geography == The settlement is located on the left bank of the Belaya River, 76 km from Maykop. == Ethnicity == The settlement is inhabited by Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Maykopsky District
title: Guzeripl
